CommandDefinition.Name: undeploytrigger
CommandDefinition.Description: Disable and stop a trigger instance, thereby undeploying eventually associated filter instances.

Argument.Name: triggerName
Argument.Description: The name of the trigger to be removed

Argument.Name: triggerInstanceName
Argument.Description: The name of the trigger instance to be removed

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Print verbose output of the state after the operation has finished.
